pluggable.name: Chicklet
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
Morgante Pell
pluggable.description: This plugin creates two new blocks which show off statistics about your blog, including information pulled from Feedburner.

help.value:
After activating this plugin, these block types will be available for you to use and configure in the 'Areas' of the Theme admin page:

  • Activity Sparkline shows a Sparkline of your recent blog activity, including posts and comments.
  • Statistis shows statistics about your blog, including number of posts, comments, tags, and subscribers (if Feedburner is enabled).

To enable subscriber statistics, be sure to include your Feedburner addresses in the configuration settings.
